constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 83 (Monday, May 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of Nebraska:
H.R. 7788.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
=========================== NOTE ===========================
On page H5010, May 16, 2022, in the left column, the following
language appears: By Mr SMITH of Washington: H.R. 7788. Congress
has the power to enact this legis-
The online version has been corrected to read: By Mr. SMITH of
Nebraska: H.R. 7788. Congress has the power to enact this legis-
========================= END NOTE =========================
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution,
specifically Clause 6
[Page H5010]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: North Platte Canteen Congressional Gold Medal Act
